tasks.dev-cs: deno run --allow-import --allow-read --allow-write --watch src/main.ts export -o ./data -f cs --key-row=2 --type-row=3 --desc-row=4 --ignore-rows=4 --keep-blank-rows --csharp-ns Content.Config sheets/
tasks.dev-json: deno run --allow-import --allow-read --allow-write --watch src/main.ts export -o ./data -f json --key-row=2 --type-row=3 --desc-row=4 --ignore-rows=4 --keep-blank-rows sheets/
